title: Dvorak - The Very Best of Dvorak (Various, 2006)
description:
"The Very Best of Dvorak", retail 2006.

This is the 2CD "very best of" compilation from the naxos series with the cartoonish abomination album covers. The original front cover album art is obviously not embedded, but replaced with decent custom 600x600.

Codec profile is Opus VBR at bitrate 96 (libopus 1.1),
genre marked as Classical - and tracks are as always tagged and pretty.

				enjoy ! /dussin






		Composer: Antonin Dvorak (1841-1904)

					Composition / (Performers):

1	Carnival Overture, Op. 92
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / BBC Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
2	Humoresques, Op. 101: No. 7 - Poco lento e grazioso in G flat major
	 (Stefan Veselka)
	
3	String Quartet No. 12 in F Major, Op. 96, "American": III. Molto vivace
	 (Vlach Quartet Prague)
	
4	Symphony No. 8 in G Major, Op. 33: III. Allegretto grazioso - Molto vivace
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Slovak Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
5	7 Gypsy Melodies "Zigeunerlieder", Op. 55: No. 4. Songs my mother taught me (arr. violin and piano)
	 (Zhou Qian / Edmund Battersby)
	
6	Serenade in E Major, Op. 22: I. Moderato
	 (Jaroslav Krcek / Capella Istropolitana)
	
7	16 Slavonic Dances, Op. 46: No. 2 in E Minor
	 (Zdenek Kosler / Slovak Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
8	Piano Trio in F minor "Dumky", Op. 90: III. Andante - Vivace non troppo
	 (Joachim Trio)
	
9	Symphony No. 7 in D Minor, Op. 70: III. Scherzo: Vivace - Poco meno messo
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Slovak Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
10	Violin Sonatina in G Major, Op. 100: II. Larghetto
	 (Zhou Qian / Edmund Battersby)
	
11	Slavonic Dances, Op. 72 No. 2 in E minor
	 (Zdenek Kosler / Slovak Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
12	Rusalka, Op. 114, Act I: 'O, Silver Moon'
	 (Johannes Wildner / Slovak Radio Symphony Orchestra / Jana Valaskova)
	
13	The Noon Witch (Polednice), Op. 108
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra)
	
14	Slavonic Dances, Op. 46 No. 1 in C Major
	 (Zdenek Kosler / Slovak Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
15	Stabat Mater, Op. 58: Fac ut portem Christi mortem
	 (Robert Shafer / Washington Orchestra / Washington Chorus / Soloists)
	
16	Serenade for Wind, Op. 44: I. Moderato, quasi marcia
	 (Oslo Philharmonic Wind Soloists)
	
17	Cello Concerto in B Minor, Op. 104: II. Adagio ma non troppo
	 (Michael Halasz / Royal Philharmonic Orchestra / Maria Kliegel)
	
18	Piano Quintet in A major, Op. 81: III. Scherzo (Furiant), Molto Vivace
	 (Vlach Quartet Prague / Ivan Klansky)
	
19	Czech Suite in D Major, Op. 39: II. Polka 
	 (Antoni Wit / Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra)
	
20	Legends, Op. 59: No. 2 in G Major
	 (Christian Kohn / Silke-Thora Matthies)
	
21	Symphony No. 9 in E minor "From the New World", Op. 95: II. Largo
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / Slovak Philharmonic Orchestra)
	
22	Two Waltzes, Op. 54: Waltz No. 1: Moderato
	 (Vlach Quartet Prague)
	
23	Romance in F Minor, Op. 11
	 (Zhou Qian / Edmund Battersby)
	
24	My Homeland, Op. 62
	 (Stephen Gunzenhauser / BBC Philharmonic Orchestra)
